channel.title: PowerShell on Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in PowerShell on Handbook

item.title: File
item.description: Extension # System.IO.Path.GetExtension # [System.IO.Path]::GetExtension(Draftv2.zip) Returns the extension (including the period “.”) of the specified path string. See also M$ Learn. FileSystemInfo.Extension # > (Get-ChildItem Draftv2.zip).Extension .zip > (Get-Item Draftv2.zip).Extension .zip Gets the extension part of the file name, including the leading dot . even if it is the entire file name, or an empty string if no extension is present. See also M$ Learn. Expand-Archive # Expand-Archive -Path Draftv2.
